label: Unknown 5
notes: First 2 bytes here are frequently (but not always) CA E8.

label: GP difficulty
notes: Novice 0, Standard 1, Expert 2, Master 3. Time Attack gets 1.

label: Unknown 9
notes: Always 0?

label: Unknown 10
notes: Always 3?

label: Unknown machine index
notes: Time Attack: always 0? GP first track of a cup: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, ..., 29, 0 when scrolling through the racers. GP not first track of a cup: numbers 0 to 29, but scrambled this time. Don't know what the number actually represents; it's not the machine's position in the starting grid.

label: Color swap
notes: Default color is 0. Press L on the machine settings screen to go 0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 0.

label: Unknown 19
notes: 1 or 2

label: Emblem count
notes: Number of emblem slots filled; 0 to 4

label: Unknown 23
notes: Always 0?

label: Emblem array
notes: Corresponds to the 4 slots in the apply-emblem menu

label: Emblem part
notes: 0 body, 1 cockpit, 2 booster

label: Vertical rotation
notes: Default and maximum 3FFF, minimum 0800

label: Horizontal rotation
notes: Default and minimum 0000, maximum probably FFFF. 45deg left ~= E06E, 90deg right ~= 400E, 180deg L/R ~= 807C

label: Base position 1?
notes: Seems to depend on the part you're applying to? Needs more testing.

label: Base position 2?
notes: Seems to depend on the part you're applying to? Needs more testing.

label: Emblem size 1
notes: Range is 0.35 (largest) to 0.05 (smallest). Default is 0.35. Could one size be horizontal and the other vertical? Can't adjust them individually in the apply-emblem menu, though.

label: Emblem pixel data
notes: Same format as in an emblem GCI.

label: Pilot ID
notes: IDs are the same as the pilot's non-custom machine ID, e.g. Jody Summer and White Cat.

label: Body color
notes: Red byte, Green byte, Blue byte, and 01. Color swapping in the Machine Settings screen IS taken into account.

label: Unknown 50
notes: Always 0?

label: Unknown One-Bit Array
notes: Thought the length was racer_array_element_count but maybe it's just 1?

label: Unknown Two-Bit Array
notes: Thought the length was racer_array_element_count but maybe it's just 1?

label: Unknown Array
notes: Always 4 elements. Replay checkpoints?

label: Unknown 53
notes: Frame number? 1st seems to always be 182. 2nd-4th seem to be random within the middle of the race.

label: Unknown 54
notes: Often same as above, other times a little different, like in GPI 2'10"174 Cosmic Star-G4 (yoshifan), LLC GP Sonic Phantom (yoshifan)

label: Unknown 56
notes: These 5 fields are more interesting in GP replays

label: Unknown 61
notes: These 12 fields seem to have X,Y,Z positions? Don't know why there are 4 XYZ positions though. Often all 4 positions are the same, other times some are different, like in the same examples where the frame numbers are different.

label: Replay Array
notes: The "+ 1" on the length means that 0 on that value means 1 length, 5 on that value means 6 length, etc. Frame count behaves the same.

label: Buttons
notes: 0x04 with nothing, 0x14 with L+R, 0x44 with boost.

label: Frames
notes: Frame count on this set of inputs, minus 1. So if this value is 2, then it actually means 3 frames.
